verses.name: Leviticus 11:19
verses.text: And the stork, the heron after her kind, and the lapwing, and the bat.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:20
verses.text: All fowls that creep, going upon all four, shall be an abomination unto you.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:21
verses.text: Yet these may ye eat of every flying creeping thing that goeth upon all four, which have legs above their feet, to leap withal upon the earth;

verses.name: Leviticus 11:22
verses.text: Even these of them ye may eat; the locust after his kind, and the bald locust after his kind, and the beetle after his kind, and the grasshopper after his kind.
